title: Bug 37021 - Source path displayed incorrectly in declare warning on binary files
description:
Bug 37021 - Source path displayed incorrectly in declare warning on binary files [java|aj]
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Navigate to the 'tests/new/binaryWarnings' directory.
2. Run the code in this directory to reproduce the issue.

Observed Behavior:
- When declare warning messages target .class files from injars, the source path is displayed in the form 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main.class'.

Expected Behavior:
- The source path in declare warning messages should be displayed as 'app/Main.class' for better readability and clarity.
OB: When viewing declare warning messages targeting .class files from injars, the source path is displayed as 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main.class'.
EB: In declare warning messages when targeting .class files from injars, the source path should be listed in the form 'app/Main.class' instead of 'app.Main.class'.
SR:
1. Navigate to the 'tests/new/binaryWarnings' directory.
2. Run the code in this directory to reproduce the issue.
